history.narrative: Law 18-369, the “Brownfield Revitalization Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-1092, which was referred to the Committee Government Operations and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 27, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-720 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-369 became effective on April 8, 2011.
